Its mission is to preach the gospel of Jesus Christ and to meet human needs in His name without discrimination.", "notes": "We continue to serve sack lunch daily MON - THURS 11 am to 12:30 pm. On Monday and Thursday we offer a grab n go pantry along with the sack lunch.   Pantry typically consists of customer choices of frozen meat items, fresh produce, bread & bakery goods- plus shelf-stable items. Subject to change daily based on availability.   We have a translator on site.
